text: Umberto Marengo (born 21 July 1992 in Giaveno) is an Italian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2013 : 9th Coppa della Pace ;2017 :Challenge du Prince ::1st Trophée de l'Anniversaire ::8th Trophée Princier :Les Challenges de la Marche Verte ::2nd GP Sakia El Hamra ::4th GP Oued Eddahab ::5th GP Al Massira : 5th Giro del Medio Brenta : 7th Overall Tour du Maroc ;2018 : 6th Trofeo Città di Brescia : 9th Trofeo Alcide Degasperi ;2019 : 1st Stage 1 Tour of Utah :5th Overall Tour of Taiyuan : 10th Coppa Bernocchi ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists
title: Umberto Marengo
